verses.text: And the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w made|strong="H4427"\w* \w Ahaziah|strong="H0274"\w* his \w youngest|strong="H6996"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w king|strong="H4427"\w* in his stead: for the band of \w men|strong="H1416"\w* that \w came|strong="H0935"\w* with the \w Arabians|strong="H6163"\w* to the \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* had \w slain|strong="H2026"\w* all the \w eldest|strong="H7223"\w*. So \w Ahaziah|strong="H0274"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehoram|strong="H3088"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w*.

\w Forty|strong="H0705"\w* and \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \w old|strong="H1121"\w* \add was\add* \w Ahaziah|strong="H0274"\w* when he began to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*, and he \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* in \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*. His \w mother’s|strong="H0517"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* also \add was\add* \w Athaliah|strong="H6271"\w* the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w Omri|strong="H6018"\w*.

He also \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* in the \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w*: for his \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* was his \w counsellor|strong="H3289"\w* to do \w wickedly|strong="H7561"\w*.

Wherefore he \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* in the \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* like the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w*: for they were his \w counsellors|strong="H3289"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* the \w death|strong="H4194"\w* of his \w father|strong="H0001"\w* to his \w destruction|strong="H4889"\w*.

¶ He \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* also after their \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w*, and \w went|strong="H3212"\w* with \w Jehoram|strong="H3088"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to \w war|strong="H4421"\w* against \w Hazael|strong="H2371"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w* at \w Ramoth-gilead|strong="H7433"\w*: and the \w Syrians|strong="H7421"\w* \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* \w Joram|strong="H3141"\w*.

And he \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* to be \w healed|strong="H7495"\w* in \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w* because of the \w wounds|strong="H4347"\w* which were \w given|strong="H5221"\w* him at \w Ramah|strong="H7414"\w*, when he \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* with \w Hazael|strong="H2371"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w*. And \w Azariah|strong="H5838"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehoram|strong="H3088"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* went \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w Jehoram|strong="H3088"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* at \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w*, because he was \w sick|strong="H2470"\w*.\f + \fr 22.6 \ft which…: Heb. wherewith they wounded him\f*\f + \fr 22.6 \ft Azariah: also called, Ahaziah, or, Jehoahaz\f*

And the \w destruction|strong="H8395"\w* of \w Ahaziah|strong="H0274"\w* was of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* by \w coming|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Joram|strong="H3141"\w*: for when he was \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, he went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* with \w Jehoram|strong="H3088"\w* against \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nimshi|strong="H5250"\w*, whom the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* to cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w*.\f + \fr 22.7 \ft destruction: Heb. treading down\f*

And it came to pass, that, when \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* was executing \w judgment|strong="H8199"\w* upon the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w*, and \w found|strong="H4672"\w* the \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, and the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w* of \w Ahaziah|strong="H0274"\w*, that \w ministered|strong="H8334"\w* to \w Ahaziah|strong="H0274"\w*, he \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* them.

And he \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* \w Ahaziah|strong="H0274"\w*: and they \w caught|strong="H3920"\w* him, (for he was \w hid|strong="H2244"\w* in \w Samaria|strong="H8111"\w*,) and \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* him to \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w*: and when they had \w slain|strong="H4191"\w* him, they \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* him: Because, \w said|strong="H0559"\w* they, he \add is\add* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w*, who \w sought|strong="H1875"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* with all his \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*. So the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Ahaziah|strong="H0274"\w* had no \w power|strong="H3581"\w* to \w keep|strong="H6113"\w* still the \w kingdom|strong="H4467"\w*.

¶ But when \w Athaliah|strong="H6271"\w* the \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* of \w Ahaziah|strong="H0274"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* that her \w son|strong="H1121"\w* was \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, she \w arose|strong="H6965"\w* and \w destroyed|strong="H1696"\w* all the \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w royal|strong="H4467"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

But \w Jehoshabeath|strong="H3090"\w*, the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w Joash|strong="H3101"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahaziah|strong="H0274"\w*, and \w stole|strong="H1589"\w* him from \w among|strong="H8432"\w* the \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* that were \w slain|strong="H4191"\w*, and \w put|strong="H5414"\w* him and his \w nurse|strong="H3243"\w* in a \w bedchamber|strong="H2315"\w*. So \w Jehoshabeath|strong="H3090"\w*, the \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* of \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Jehoram|strong="H3088"\w*, the \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* of \w Jehoiada|strong="H3077"\w* the \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, (for she was the \w sister|strong="H0269"\w* of \w Ahaziah|strong="H0274"\w*,) \w hid|strong="H5641"\w* him \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w Athaliah|strong="H6271"\w*, so that she \w slew|strong="H4191"\w* him not.\f + \fr 22.11 \ft Jehoshabeath: also called, Jehosheba\f*

And he was with them \w hid|strong="H2244"\w* in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*: and \w Athaliah|strong="H6271"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* over the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.
